SELECT CASE WHEN P01HSGU='0' THEN '정상' WHEN P01HSGU='1' THEN '반품' WHEN P01HSGU='2' THEN '오타정정' WHEN P01HSGU='3' THEN '선수발생' WHEN P01HSGU='4' THEN '선수취소' WHEN P01HSGU='5' THEN '선수결말' ELSE '기타' END AS saleDiv --시재구분 ,CASE WHEN P01HSG1='1' THEN '현금' WHEN P01HSG1='2' THEN '카드' WHEN P01HSG1='3' THEN '카드' WHEN P01HSG1='4' THEN '외상' WHEN P01HSG1='5' THEN '특판' WHEN P01HSG1='6' THEN '직불카드' WHEN P01HSG1='7' THEN 'COD' WHEN P01HSG1='8' THEN '자사상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='9' THEN '타사상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='A' THEN '자상환불' WHEN P01HSG1='B' THEN '선수현금' WHEN P01HSG1='C' THEN '선수카드' WHEN P01HSG1='D' THEN '선수상품' WHEN P01HSG1='E' THEN '장바구니' WHEN P01HSG1='F' THEN '제휴상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='G' THEN '사용매출' WHEN P01HSG1='H' THEN '포인트결제' WHEN P01HSG1='J' THEN '현대상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='K' THEN 'SK상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='L' THEN 'LG상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='I' THEN '제휴환불' WHEN P01HSG1='M' THEN '통판' WHEN P01HSG1='N' THEN '포인트상품권' WHEN P01HSG1='O' THEN '포인트환불' WHEN P01HSG1='P' THEN '포인트반품' WHEN P01HSG1='' THEN '' ELSE '기타' END AS payDiv1
